
  get in qclass, find, stretch, sub tree, add layout, add widget, tab, comment



  app_title_group_box               group
    app_title_layout                hbox
      push_right                    stretch
      gui_title                     lbl         # example comment
  settings_strip                    vbox
    source_row                      hbox
      source_grouping               vbox
        source_settings             hbox
          # example comment         -
          source_summary            label(Source__Summary)
          source_refresh_btns       label(Source__Refresh__Buttons)
        progress_slider             label(Progress__Slider)
      source_rhs_buttons            label(Source__RHS__Buttons)
    display_row                     label(Row)
  app_main_panel                    label(Main__Panel)
  app_footer                        hbox
    img_1                           ?CustomImg
    img_2                           ?CustomImg
    img_3                           ?CustomImg




top_level                           vbox

  app_main_panel                    label(Main__Panel)

another_tree                        tab
  invoices                          widget
    layout                          vbox
      title                         label(Title)
      etc
  messages                          widget
  todos                             widget
